text: Window to the East: Engage in transit trade by buying and selling Eastern commodities and Western commodities. You can also use them to bloster your troops
Whenever you complete a convoy journey to an order faction's settlements, you'll get an entrepot building
Valbrand's Horde: Capitol techs will be unlocked by razing capitals for Khorne instead of occupying them
Slaver: May sacrifice slaves to recieve powerful boons of Khorne and Chaos
Khorne's Chosen: Valbrand will directly face the monsters hidden within the arcanum
Tzeentch's Chosen: Volrik will directly face the monsters hidden within the arcanum
Dedicated to Khorne: May only devote himself to Khorne
Dedicated to Tzeentch: May only devote himself to Tzeentch
Ravenblessed: May gather grimoires and use these to recieve boons of Tzeentch and Chaos
After a successful battle, you might get a chance to establish mercenary branch office in the other faction's settlement
Chance of region owner gaining Maneater unit: %n%
Mercenary branch will be destroyed if region owner is at war with you
